name: Poly Shooter
description:
Poly Shooter is a survival experimentation.


4 Citizens have been kidnapped to test a survival experimentation where they have to kill cyborgs.
It's a military test to prove the efficiency of them.

It's a simple and dynamic shooter, full of fun.

• Single player WAVE MODE with Guns

• Single player WAVE MODE with a sword

• 2 to 4 PLAYERS in Local WAVE and VERSUS MODE

HAVE FUN !
